ounit 1.1.2


    

      

        

    
Unit testing framework inspired by the JUnit tool and the HUnit tool

    
  

        

          
            
            

              Versions
              
             
               1.1.2
             
           , 
             
               2.0.0
              
            

      
            
            
            
            
            
            

              Maintainer
              contact@ocamlpro.com
            

      
            
            
            

              Dependencies
               ocamlfind
            

      
            
            
            
            
            

              Published
              Aug 31, 2014
            

      
            
        

        Source  [http] 
        
          http://forge.ocamlcore.org/frs/download.php/886/ounit-1.1.2.tar.gz

           14e4d8ee551004dbcc1607f438ef7d83 
        		
        

      
             
            
            

              Edit
              
        https://github.com/ocaml/opam-repository/tree/master/packages/ounit/ounit.1.1.2/opam
      
            

      
          
        

      

      

        

          
            
             
Necessary for

           
 0install
 alcotest
 arakoon
 baardskeerder
 beluga
 camltc
 cohttp
 core (< 109.19.00)
 cow
 crc
 cstruct (>= 1.1.0)
 ctypes (< 0.2.3)
 fileutils
 frenetic
 gettext
 hamt
 humane-re (>= 0.0.3)
 imap
 io-page
 iocaml (< 0.4.2)
 iocaml-kernel
 irc-client
 leveldb
 libres3
 mbr-format
 mirage-block-unix
 mirage-net-unix
 missinglib
 mustache
 oasis (< 0.3.0)
 ocaml-expect
 ocaml-markdown
 ocaml-posix-resource
 ocaml-radixtree
 ocaml-xdg-basedir
 ocaml-zmq
 omake-mode
 oni
 pa_ounit (>= 109.10.00)
 pci-db
 qmp
 qtest (>= 2.0.1)
 riak
 shared-memory-ring
 sqlgg
 tar-format (>= 0.2.0)
 tuntap (>= 1.0.0)
 ucorelib
 vhd-format
 vhd-tool
 xen-api-client
 xen-gnt
 xenstore
 zmq

            
             
Optional for

           
 batsh
 dlist
 extunix
 gapi-ocaml (>= 0.2.1)
